headline: Post-Quantum Cryptography Market Outlook Report 2025-2035, with Profiles of Crypta Labs, ISARA, MagiQ Technologies, NEC, NXP Semiconductors, Quantum Xchange, Qubitekk, QuintessenceLabs, and More
summary: The PQC market offers significant opportunities driven by the quantum threat to classical encryption, necessitating quantum-resistant solutions in sectors like finance and healthcare.
